title: cipezer
author: cipezer
content: Hello Bitcointalk community!We're excited to announce the launch of our MVP testing phase for Shear Blockchain, the game-changer in the fight against climate change. 🌿🌟 Why should you contribute?✅ Be a pioneer in the sustainability movement by testing our groundbreaking blockchain technology.✅ Earn valuable Shear tokens for your contributions and feedback.✅ Shape the future of a sustainable world by actively participating in our global initiative.🔗 How to get involved?1️⃣ Register your wallet and test our APP https://app.earthshepards.com2️⃣ Get hands-on experience with the Shear Blockchain platform and provide feedback.3️⃣ Help us refine the platform to ensure maximum efficiency in rewarding sustainable actions.4️⃣ Spread the word! Share your MVP testing experience on our Discord Server - https://discord.gg/zkCeaYbw🌎 Shear Blockchain aims to revolutionize how we combat climate change. By testing our MVP, you're not only contributing to a greener planet but also earning rewards for your efforts. Let's come together and make a tangible impact on our environment.🚀 Join the Shear community and be a part of this transformative journey. Together, we can create a more sustainable future for generations to come.#ShearBlockchain #MVPTesting #Sustainability #ClimateAction #Bitcointalk #ContributeToChange

comments.author: SharPeiMaster
comments.body: Got it! Just grabbed my coins!
